mapper.insert: insert into hm_crm_gold_temp (FORMID, FORMNAME, SRCID, SRCNAME, TYPEID, TYPENAME, MEMO, COLLECTERID, COLLECTERNAME, CREATETIME, ADID, ADADDRESS, KZNAME, KZPHONE, WECHAT, ADDRESS, REMARK, IP, IPADDRESS, COMPANYID, STATUSID) values (#{formId},#{formName},#{srcId},#{srcName},#{typeId} #{typeName},#{memo},#{collecterId},#{collecterName},#{createTime},#{adId}, #{adAddress},#{kzName},#{kzPhone},#{wechat},#{address}, #{remark},#{ip},#{ipAddress},#{companyId},#{statusId})
